name: Flow Chair Stacking: Upholstered
description:
Description

Taking its name from the fluid look of its steam-bent form, Flow’s upholstered-seat version also stacks easily when not in use. Born of a collaboration with Japanese designer Tomoko Azumi, the seating exemplifies the warm elegance of Japanese design and suits a diversity of different settings — from corporate workspaces to intimate dining locales and private residences. Made of solid ash with bespoke upholstery choices, it’s offered in a range of finishes, including natural and varied modern tones.  

Specifications

Size

  • 29.9" h x 19.3" w x 20.9" d (76x49x53cm)
  • Seat: 18.1" h x 16.1" d (46x41cm)

Material

Ash, oak, walnut

Details

  • Fabric 1: Main Line Flax, Sumi, Synergy
  • Fabric 2: Yoredale
  • Fabric 3: Hallingdal 65, Remix 3, Safire
  • Leather: Ultra Leather
  • COM and COL are available on request
meta_title: Flow Chair Stacking: Upholstered | Buy L.Ercolani online at A+R

name: Originals Butterfly Chair: Upholstered
description:
Description

Launched in 1956, L.Ercolani’s enduring Originals Butterfly Chair gets an update with an upholstered-seat version. The iconic everyday dining seating features traditional Windsor wedge and tenon joinery, a technique in which the chair’s legs are extended through the seat, secured with a wedge, and then sanded until they lie flush with the seat. Offered in ash timber with an ash veneer steam-bent ply seat and back, this Midcentury classic comes in a range of timber finishes and innumerable complementary upholstery selections. 

Specifications

Size

  • 32.3" h x 20.1" w x 18.1" d (82x51x46cm)
  • Seat: 18.5" h x 12.6" d (47x32cm)

Material

Ash, walnut

  • Fabric 2: Yoredale
  • Fabric 3: Hallingdal 65, Remix 3, Safire
  • Leather: Ultra Leather
  • COM and COL are available on request
meta_title: Originals Butterfly Chair: Upholstered | Buy L.Ercolani online at A+R

name: Mass Console Table
description:
Description

The humble plank gets the posh treatment in Tom Dixon’s dazzling console table that uses the most basic unit in furniture construction as its thematic starting point. In super-polished solid brass, Mass is made in the UK by skilled metalworkers, with the cladding fashioned from a single extruded box section of brass. The archetypal plank construction transmogrifies into a monumental, gold-hued sculpture, waxed to provide protection and eventually developing a gradual natural patina across its surface.

Specifications

Size

29.3" h x 70.9" w x 19.7" d (74.5x180x50cm)

Material

Brass, aluminum, steel
meta_title: Mass Console Table | Buy Tom Dixon online at A+R

name: Mass Dining Table 2.0
description:
Description

Elevating the most basic element in furniture construction—the simple plank—Tom Dixon makes a monumental dining table in super-polished solid brass. From the designer’s Mass series made in the UK by expert metalworkers, the gleaming construction is formed from a single extruded box section of the golden-hued metal, with a steel subframe. A collectible to treasure for the ages, the table’s waxed surface will eventually develop a cherished patina to register the passing of time.

Specifications

Size

29.7" h x 78.7" w x 35.4" d (75.5x200x90cm)

Brass, aluminum, steel

name: Mantis BS8 L Floor Lamp
description:
Description

Bernard Schottlander’s BS8 L evokes its namesake praying mantis in weightlessness, playing on the tension between balance and imbalance. Now, the designer’s original 1951 linear structure, topped by a black shade pivoting on a ball joint, has been structurally tweaked and improved just as Schottlander envisioned in his time. Along with a round base, the arm mechanism adopts a circular mechanism, only proving the timelessness of his original concept.

Specifications

Size

  • 68.5" h x 13.8" dia (174x35cm)
  • Cable length: 78.7" (200cm)

Material

Steel

Technical

  • ETL listed
  • E12
  • Bulb not included
meta_title: Mantis BS8 L Floor Lamp | Buy DCW Éditions online at A+R

name: NL12 Suspension Pendant Lamp
description:
Description

Designed to illuminate a large dining room table, Berlin designer Sebastian Summa’s tour-de-force pendant cleverly toys with visual perception. Composed of 12 borosilicate glass tubes, only the one at the center functions as NL12’s light source while the other tubes act as diffusers via refraction and prism. Without any visible wire or discernable LEDs, the sole structure seems to come from the pair of brackets resembling gymnastics clamps that balance the bundle of tubes perfectly.

Specifications

Size

  • 156.5" h x 51.2" w x 4.1" d (397.5x130x10.4cm)
  • Canopy: 1.6" h x 17.1" w x 2.7" d (4.2x43.5x7cm)
  • Cable length: 177" (449.6cm)

Material

Aluminum, glass

Technical

  • ETL listed
  • Color temperature: 2700K
  • Non-dimmable
  • Integrated LED
meta_title: NL12 Suspension Pendant Lamp | Buy DCW Éditions online at A+R

name: Soul Story 1 Wall Lamp
description:
Description

Soul Story 1, like its sister wall lights, was born of a chance meeting between French-Lebanese designer Charles Kalpakian and DCW Èditions’ Frédéric Winkler at a design fair. In white plaster, with or without gold leaf decoration, the designer plays on the image of a dusky night suddenly being pierced with a surreal ray of light in the varied constructions lit by an integrated LED. Kalpakian even includes a doppelgänger of himself in the small metal figure standing watch, inviting further contemplation of the configuration while also acting as a type of signature.

Specifications

Size

  • 11.3" h x 7.4" w x 6.5" d (28.7x18.7x16.5cm)
  • Clamp: 5.7" w x 0.6" d (14.6x1.5cm)

Material

Gypsum, plaster

Technical

  • ETL listed
  • Color temperature: 2700K
  • Dimmable
  • Integrated LED

Made entirely from natural jute, Ferm Living’s design hangs from a beechwood bar and features a stylized abstraction in natural tones. Finished off with fringes at the bottom, it lends an organic yet modern focal point to a room. The rug and hanging rod are conveniently shipped in a cardboard tube.

name: Oyster Wall Lamp
description:
Description

With its organic shape, Oyster Wall Lamp belies its man-made prowess, engineered in casted recycled aluminum with a replaceable integrated LED light strip. The lamp's perceptible texture and black patina have a distinctive, rough character owing to the casting process, with a compelling interplay between its curved form and raw surface. name: Post Storage Cabinet

Description

With bold proportions inspired by the modernist movement Brutalism, Ferm Living's storage cabinet tempers the volume with intriguing front striping. Made from FSC Mix-certified wood, Post features doors in the vertical pattern detailed in oak veneer through the intricate and time-consuming carpentry technique known as marquetry.
